channel.title: Destructo match ii script updated!
channel.description:
It's a nice script,stops when it loses and can go FOREVER if not slow.It has all the stone colors and stuff,I might make one with DTM's but right now this is one is good. :eek:
My second script! :D
Hope you enjoy! :)
[b]Please inform me if you used these scripts or have any prolems, etc.[/b]
[b]ON VERSION 2 YOU MUST PUT IT ON THE HIGHEST RESOLUTION OR IT WILL MESS YOUR COMPUTER[/b]
[b]VERSION 3 WORKS ON ANY RESOLUTION!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/b]
Post problems here! :confused: [b] Version 1.1[/b] [i]It is pretty slow on the coords,but still works.[/i] [b]Version 2.0[/b] [i]Very nice,completely coords, you may think "Coords!They are SOOO lame."But coords sometimes matter.Enjoy!Version 3.21 will have DTM's[/i] [b]Verson 3.1[/b] [i]Extremely wonderful,you must pick the colors for the stones if they don't work well,no auto-color but very well written(still on coords).[/i]
Scripts Here:

item.title: Destructo match ii script updated!
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

[quote=“alienware, post:4, topic:130855”]There is no use of finding colors here and then clicking them…
Finding colors makes the script slow…

How much can the script score any way?
I made one… it goes up to 1500 (score)[/quote]
This script doesen’t find colors.It clicks on coords=coordinates.Your mistaken, pick color finds the colors.
For example if I were to pick a color it would be like this:
Color Picked: 16777215 at (667, 538)
You see the color is=16777215
But the coords are (667, 538)
So if I were to put this into a basic sentence it would be like this:
The script found a color color number:16777215 at the coordinates (667, 538).
You get it now?
See,if I were make it to click colors it would be Clickmouse(16777215,and another color,true)
And by the way the script can get up to 2000.

~~

Script_Owned4
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2007, 08:44:18 AM[/size][hr]SCRIPT HAS BEEN UPDATED

Read full topic
